attributes.action: Prorogue Parliament,  debit prorogued or dissolved to prevent extended art 50
attributes.additional_details:
No more time should be allowed to debate something that can not be debated. 
The split in the house is seen to be manipulated by the parliamentary majority of remain members. 
The 52% deserve to have their day.
attributes.background:
Prorogue Parliament
Parliament must be prorogued or dissolved to prevent an extension to the Article 50 period. The UK's intention to withdraw from the EU has been decided during the 2016 Referendum please deliver the result.
